com.archibus.datasource
Interface ObjectDataSource<T>

All Superinterfaces:
DataSource, com.archibus.core.dao.IDao<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ObjectDataSourceImpl
public interface ObjectDataSource<T>
extends DataSource, com.archibus.core.dao.IDao<T>

ObjectDataSource is an extension of the DataSource interface. In addition to methods provided by the regular DataSource that retrieve/update/delete generic DataRecords, it provides methods that retrieve/update/delete custom objects.
